titleStmt.title: Garrett Davis et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG0877

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Military Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p: The undersigned, some of us knowing John Foster, of Georgetown Ky, personally, & others knowing him from reputation, believe that from his capacity, courage, activity & physical constitution, is well fitted to fill the office of Lieut. in the State Military service of the State of Kentucky: We do therefore earnestly reccommend him to his Excellency the Governor of that State for that place

Garrett Davis
LW Powell
R Mallory
W H Wadsworth
H. Grider
Brutus J. Clay
Geo H Yeaman
